title: Pecan Pie Smoothie

winePairing.pairingText: Southern can be paired with Riesling, Sparkling Wine, and Zinfandel. In general, there are a few rules that will help you pair wine with southern food. Food-friendly riesling or sparkling white wine will work with many fried foods, while zinfandel is great with barbecued fare. One wine you could try is Poet's Leap Riesling. It has 4 out of 5 stars and a bottle costs about 20 dollars.

productMatches.title: Poet's Leap Riesling
productMatches.description: Key lime and fresh citrus peel aromas give way to vivid layers of white peach and stone fruit flavors accented by a pleasant touch of minerality. Delicious natural acidity and a hint of residual sugar provide a balanced, vibrant mouth-feel and lengthy finish.

instructions: Place all ingredients into the bowl of a blender and process until completely smooth.

steps.step: Place all ingredients into the bowl of a blender and process until completely smooth.
